title: Geospatial Memory Optimizer
description: High-performance framework utilizing Copy-On-Write (COW) shared memory architecture for processing large-scale raster datasets.

title: Precipitation Modeling Optimization
description: Novel directional DEM smoothing and stratified kriging framework reducing estimation errors by 45.4%.

title: Raster Voronoi Solver
description: Algorithm for generating Voronoi diagrams directly on raster grids for environmental modeling.
